reviews.name: nr 1 shrek fan
reviews.title: Best movie ever!!!
reviews.text: Its funny, stupid and gross. I love it!

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults!
reviews.text: The jokes for adults that go over the kids heads make this a great movie for the entire family, so long as your kids don't ask you why you're laughing.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I own several Shrek shirts because of this movie
reviews.text: What the title said

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: This one is somehow better than the first one
reviews.text: If you thought the fisrt Shrek movie was good, you have not seen the second. Its funnier, wilder and somehow more innapropriate than the first.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: Writing this at 3 am
reviews.text: Is it the best movie ive seen? No. Will i be able to sleep tonight? No.

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Nicolas Cage was in this movie?
reviews.text: The SFX team made Cage look unrecogniceable and his amazing performance only made it better! A must if you like horror.

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: Funny
reviews.text: A classic, I think the donkey is annoying but i like the rest. I hope he isn't in the sequel.

reviews.name: nr 1 shrek fan
reviews.title: I changed my mind, this one is the best movie ever
reviews.text: Its funnier, stupider and grosser than the first one! A masterpiece!

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: oooo Spooky
reviews.text: I understand why people say they're dissapointed but i don't agree, Lilly-Rose Depp plays Ellen imaculately and nothing could make me dislike Bill Skarsg√•rds count Orlok.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: I'm dissapionted
reviews.text: There's only one kind of movie thats worse than a bad one; a mediocre one.

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: Very good
reviews.text: Im not surprised this movie won A oscar but All of them? Sure.

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I watched it at leat 4 times
reviews.text: Fantastic Spectacular give me 14 more

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Im now scared of nicholas cage living in my basement
reviews.text: A solid 3 from me, a good scary movie but not anything special

reviews.name: Geek Barbie
reviews.title: I owe Greta Gerwig my life
reviews.text: :O

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: I think i need a pink cowboy hat
reviews.text: I want to buy a pink house and a pink car and a pink fridge

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I have no idea what I just watched
reviews.text: I think I need a week to process what I just watched, but yeah you should see it if you like body horror.

reviews.name: nr 1 shrek fan
reviews.title: I wish I hadn't watched this movie
reviews.text: I kind of wanted to puke after watching this, I need to watch Shrek 2 as a palete cleanser

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Worste movie I've seen in a while
reviews.text: It's just boring and bad, not worth the time and OH ITS 2,5 HOURS LONG

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: Women :(
reviews.text: Beautifully acted, written, directed, and the costumes?? Fantastic!

reviews.name: jessica
reviews.title: A very good adaptation of the book
reviews.text: A must watch if you like the book

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: Hey... What?
reviews.text: The fisrt half was a 4, the second a 2. I don't know what else to say. But let Robert Pattinson play more weird guys, ho does it so well!

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: The pope died a day after I watched this... Should I be worried?
reviews.text: It's a very well directed and acted movie, much more tense than I expected.

reviews.name: Benny
reviews.title: Probably the best movie I've seen
reviews.text: You spend the whole movie sitting on the edge of your seat, never knowing whats going to happen next. Fantastic acting and directing. 5 stars!

reviews.name: Slimy Jim
reviews.title: The subtitles are DEFINITELY worth it
reviews.text: Bong Joon-ho can do no wrong, his oscars speech was incredible

reviews.name: Hedvig
reviews.title: I love watching insane people do insane people thing
reviews.text: Put your hand up if you did NOT expect a man living in the basement
